title: pAlisemma muddu shArade
sahitya:
pAlisemma muddu shArade enna nAligEyali nilla bArade


anupallavi

  lOla lOcane tAye niruta nambide ninna


caraNam 1    akSarakSara vivEkava ninna kukSiyoLIrELu lOkava sAkSAt rUpadinda olidu rakSisu tAye
    caraNam 2    shrngArapura nelevAsini dEvi sangIta gAna vilASini mangaLa gAtre tAye bhaLire brahmana rANi
    caraNam 3    sarvAlankAra dayA mUruti ninna caraNava stutisuve kIruti gurumUrti purandara viTTalanna stutisuta
